name: Don't Let Me Down (itch)
description:
Don't Let Me Down is a two player local co-op game for Windows and Mac. Two princesses must work together to escape a dangerous castle using their opposing gravities. One princess falls up, the other down. Because of this, they can use one another as platforms.

Green Princess Controls -> falls up

S- Jump

A- Move Right

D - Move Left

Pink Princess Controls -> falls down

Up- Jump

Right- Move Right

Left - Move Left

Made by Perebite 2019

Thanks to Naomi Burgess and Ming Lu

Music by LuminousBulb
